question_text: Which of the following statements accurately describe LTE-A? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: It builds upon LTE to support higher throughput
It provides up to 300 Mbps download speeds
It uses CDMA as its base protocol
correct_answer: It builds upon LTE to support higher throughput
It provides up to 300 Mbps download speeds
explanation: LTE-A (LTE Advanced) is an enhancement of LTE, supporting up to 300 Mbps. It is GSM-based, not CDMA, and was introduced after LTE and 2G.
